description:
Refer to Apple's webpages for information about this release:

<a class="external-links" rel="nofollow" href="https://support.apple.com/en-us/109035">macOS Sonoma 14.0 release notes

<a class="external-links" rel="nofollow" href="https://support.apple.com/en-us/120950">About the security content of macOS Sonoma 14.0

Refer to Apple's webpages for information about this release:

<a class="external-links" rel="nofollow" href="https://support.apple.com/en-us/109035">macOS Sonoma 14.1 release notes

<a class="external-links" rel="nofollow" href="https://support.apple.com/en-us/109051">About the security content of macOS Sonoma 14.1
These updates provide important bug fixes and security updates and are recommended for all users.

Refer to Apple's webpages for information about this release:

<a class="external-links" rel="nofollow" href="https://support.apple.com/en-us/109035">macOS Sonoma 14.2 release notes

<a class="external-links" rel="nofollow" href="https://support.apple.com/en-us/120879">About the security content of macOS Sonoma 14.2

These updates provide important bug fixes and security updates and are recommended for all users.

<a class="external-links" rel="nofollow" href="https://support.apple.com/en-us/120302">About the security content of macOS 14.2.1

macOS Sonoma 14.3 introduces enhancements to Apple Music, as well as other features, bug fixes, and security updates for your Mac.
  • Collaborate on playlists in Apple Music allows you to invite friends to join your playlist and everyone can add, reorder, and remove songs
  • Emoji reactions can be added to any track in a collaborative playlist in Apple Music
  • AppleCare & Warranty in Settings shows your coverage for all devices signed in with your Apple ID

<a class="external-links" rel="nofollow" href="https://support.apple.com/en-us/120309">About the security content of macOS Sonoma 14.3
This update fixes a bug that caused text to duplicate or overlap while typing.

macOS Sonoma 14.4 introduces new emoji as well as other features, bug fixes, and security updates for your Mac.
  • New mushroom, phoenix, lime, broken chain, and shaking heads emoji are now available in emoji keyboard
  • 18 people and body emoji support facing the opposite direction
  • Podcasts Episode text can be read in full, searched for a word or phrase, clicked to play from a specific point and used with accessibility features such as Text Size, Increase Contrast, and VoiceOver
  • Business Updates in Messages for Business let you get updates that you've opted into, like order status, flight notifications, fraud alerts or other transactions from trusted businesses
  • Safari Favorites Bar adds an option to show only icons for websites

<a class="external-links" rel="nofollow" href="https://support.apple.com/en-us/120895">About the security content of macOS Sonoma 14.4

This update provides bug fixes for Macs, including:
  • USB hubs connected to external displays may not be recognized
  • Copy protected Audio Unit plug-ins designed for professional music apps may not open or pass validation
  • Apps that include Java may quit unexpectedly
Refer to Apple's webpage for information about this update's security content:

<a class="external-links" rel="nofollow" href="https://support.apple.com/en-us/120889">About the security content of macOS Sonoma 14.4.1

macOS Sonoma 14.5 includes the following improvements and bug fixes:
  • Quartiles is a new and original daily word game that is now available in Apple News+
  • Scoreboard in News+ Puzzles gives you access to new player data for Crossword, Mini Crossword, and Quartiles, including stats and streaks
Refer to Apple's webpage for information about this update's security content:

<a class="external-links" rel="nofollow" href="https://support.apple.com/en-us/120903">About the security content of macOS Sonoma 14.5

This update adds support for using up to two external displays when the laptop lid is closed on 14-inch MacBook Pro with M3 chip and also provides important bug fixes and security updates. Refer to Apple's webpage for information about this update's security content:

<a class="external-links" rel="nofollow" href="https://support.apple.com/en-us/120911">About the security content of macOS Sonoma 14.6
This update includes important bug fixes and addresses an issue that prevents enabling or disabling Advanced Data Protection.

Refer to Apple's webpages for information about this release:
